text: Also around this time each year we start thinking about which movies will be in this year's NakedJen Film Festival, a tradition on Christmas Day every year when all the best pictures come out. Recent years the NJFF as its fans lovingly refer to it has been a virtual event, thanks to streaming, BitTorrent, COVID and the fact that Jen moved to SLC, though we have held them in realspace in NYC and SLC since then.
